choices: Alexis buy's 10 Berserker Card Booster Packs and Rebuilds Her Deck
Alexis Decides to Wing It and Go Duel The Berserker Duelist
12132.content:
It was just a normal day at Duel Academy, the Queen of Obelisk Blue Alexis Rhodes was taking a stroll outside as she makes her way to the Card Shop to get some cards to give her Cyber Angel Deck the boost it needs in the event that she needs to fight a duelist better than Professor Crowler or someone like Zane when he had that Cyberdark Deck, but just as she has arrived to her destination, she saw a banner that said "Duelists Wanted! Come and Get Your Chance to Test Out the New Berserker Deck!".

She kept what she saw at the back of her mind in case she decided to go and test out this deck for now as she makes her way inside the Card Shop, Alexis wastes no time and starts browsing through the selection as she thinks about what kind of booster pack she'll get and how many she'll buy for her Cyber Angel Deck, but her eyes were fixated on on particular booster pack with a picture of what looks like the Berserker monster that looks like a mysterious looking black hooded female with muscles that looked like they were 30 feet in size and mass.

"In case you were wondering what that monster is, it's one of the monsters in that new deck all the girls are talking about called Berserker Necromancer" someone said, and Alexis was startled when she heard someone saying that, only to sigh in relief when she realized that it was Ms. Dorothy who said that.

"I'm sorry that I spooked ya Alexis, I didn't know you were so fixated on looking at that booster pack" she said in a apologetic tone.

"I forgive you Ms. Dorothy, although since your here, I was wondering if this booster pack will give my Cyber Angel Deck the boost it needs?" she said wondering if this booster pack will give her the edge she's been looking for.

"Oh it'll definitely give your deck a boost, for starters Berserker Necromancer is a Level 4 Dark Spellcaster Effect Monster with 1900 ATK and 1900 DEF with a special ability that brings back monsters from the graveyard when she gets sent there, although you have to pay half of your life points if you want to bring that monster back as a Berserker Monster with a 900 ATK and DEF boost. The Field Spell Berserker Battlefield gives all Berserker Monsters a 1000 ATK and DEF boost as well as being immune to spells and traps, but it also allow the duelist to banish any monster they have in their hand and bring it back as a Berserker Monster, although the kicker is that you don't have to pay half of your life points to use a Berserker Monsters effects so as long as that field spell ain't destroyed. But I've only scratched the surface of what those cards are capable of, although if you want to find out just how good that Berserker Deck is, you can go to the dueling arena at the docks where that Berserker Duelist has set up shop" she said hoping that her explanation was enough to help out Alexis.

"Whoa.....what you just told me sounded like that Berserker Deck is basically a mix between Amazoness and Archfiends on steroids! .......Although now that I've mentioned it, I want to see if what I said holds up when I duel against that Berserker Duelist, especially since I want to know if those cards can give my Cyber Angel Deck the edge I've been looking for" she said excited that these Berserker cards might be able to strengthen her deck enough to go up against Cyberdark, Ancient Gear or Neo-Spacian caliber deck.

"Well if you REALLY want to duel against The Berserker Duelist, you might want to prepare yourself because I heard she's a pretty tough cookie when it comes to dueling, heck she even beat Zane when he went up against her!" she said, but then she and Alexis noticed that the TV that was set up here has lit up, and Ms. Dorothy knew right then and their that the Berserker Duelist who's dressed up just like Berserker Necromancer is about to make the same announcement she has made ever since she arrived at Duel Academy.

"Hello everyone from Slifer Red, Obelisk Blue and Ra Yellow, I am the Berserker Duelist, and I came to Duel Academy to give you a chance to go up against my Berserker Deck! This deck of cards along with all the new cards you've all seen and used in your decks at some point have been made and reprinted by own company Archfiend Incorporated for everyone here at Duel Academy to purchase and use in your decks, although every student here now has the chance to test out the Berserker Deck by dueling me, and I'll be staying here for five months straight so that everyone can be able to get a chance to pit their decks against mine! Buuuut if you feel like making a Berserker Deck of your own or adding some Berserker cards to give your deck that little kick before you go to duel me, Berserker Card Booster Packs are available to purchase at the Card Shop, and by the way supplies won't be limited, so you can buy as many of those or the other Archfiend Incorporated Booster Packs as you want. Just make sure you don't buy too much, they are plenty of duelists her in Duel Academy who want to buy those booster packs!" she said with confidence and bravado that even rivals that of Seto Kaiba's Announcement and Speeches, and then the TV changes back to the Archfiend Incorporated logo which was the initials A.I with the head of Berserker Dragon Empress, which was the boss monster of the Berserker Deck.

"Wow......I didn't think their would be another duelist let alone one who's a female that has her own company, I'm surprised she hasn't dueled against Kaiba at this point!" she said as she was beginning to like whoever this Berserker Duelist is.

"Well that duelist came in first place at Ms. Obelisk AND Mr. Obelisk 4 times in a row, and from what I've heard from the girls who've dueled her, she's quite a looker even though she has pecs that'll make a male bodybuilder ashamed of himself just by looking at them. But if you want to know which group of girls I've heard that from, I've found that tid bit from the girls who are either into or like art and drawings of buff chicks. Although between you and me.......I'm a tad bit surprised that they are girls who are into that sort of thing, but you didn't hear that from me" she told Alexis glad that she got that last bit of what she said to her off her chest.

"Well I guess I got my hands full if I plan on dueling her, and by the way, I'm glad that I was able to help you get something off of your chest" she said and then looks at the Berserker Card Booster Pack thinking if she should buy some and rebuild her deck with some of those cards before she goes to duel against the Berserker Duelist, or buy them later on and duel her right now.
12132.title: Alexis Vs The Berserker Duelist

choices: Alexis Gives Into Her Urge to Flex Harder
Alexis Overcomes the Urge to Flex Harder
121321.content:
She thought about which choice she'll make for 4 minutes since she wanted to be sure that she's making the right choice, and then Alexis decided that she'll buy some booster packs and rebuild her deck rather than to risk dueling the Berserker Duelist now with just the deck she has. So she takes out her wallet and checks to see if she has enough cash to buy either 10 Berserker Card Booster Packs or 5 in the event she's low on money, fortunately Alexis has more than enough cash to buy 10 Booster Packs, so she grabs the Booster Packs and pay's Ms. Dorothy $20 since Booster Packs were $2.00 per pack. Once Ms. Dorothy gives her the bag that has the Booster Packs she'd purchased, Alexis said's goodbye to her and makes her way back to her Dorm Room. As she makes her way to the Girls Dorm at Obelisk Blue, she noticed that Mindy and Jasmine were walking towards her, although she could tell that they were looking at her bag of Berserker Card Booster Packs with a smile on their faces.

"Oh.my.gosh, am I seeing things or is Alexis actually trying to step her game up?" Mindy asked hoping that her friend is actually going through with what she said last night.

"(Sighs) why would you ask her that if you can see the bag Alexis was carrying a mile away?" Jasmine said in response to what she said.

"I told you two last night that I'm dead set on stepping up my game, especially since I plan on making up for getting defeated by Satorius as well as every loss I ever had in a duel by living up to my reputation as the Queen of Obelisk Blue!" she said with a stern yet determined tone.

"And let me guess, you bought yourself a couple of Berserker Card Booster Packs to see if those cards will give you that edge you need?" Jasmine asked.

"Yes I did, although you are a bit off on how many booster packs I've bought, ......mainly because I've purchased 10 Berserker Card Booster Packs" she answered as they kept walking, which caused Mindy to gasp in shock over what she just heard.

"Alexis I know you are dead serious about stepping up your game, but buying 10 BOOSTER PACKS is basically considered to be overkill in Duel Monsters, you might as well bought the Berserker Structure Deck if you were THAT dead serious about stepping your game up!" she exclaimed as they get closer to arriving at the Girl Dorms.

"Mindy DOES make a good point, since each Booster Pack has 15 cards per pack, which contains 10 commons, 3 uncommon's, 1 rare and 1 ultra rare. In other words, you've just bought 150 cards for 20 bucks" she pointed out.

"I know what I did was overkill, but I plan on going up against the Berserker Duelist once I'm done rebuilding my deck, so I need to know what I'm going up against and rebuild my deck using the knowledge I've gained from studying each monster, spell and trap in this Berserker Deck to create the best Berserker Cyber Angel Deck I can build" she said a bit miffed about what they're saying as they have arrived at the Girls Dorm.

"(Sighs) look I really appreciate you two for being their for me as well as the support I've gotten from you, it must have been tough seeing me so down in the dumps when I've realized that I haven't improved myself as a duelist enough to keep up with the best duelists here in Duel Academy" she said and calms herself down.

"And we would do it again in a heartbeat if it meant that we can help out our friend" Mindy and Jasmine both said in unison.

Alexis smiled and waved her friends goodbye as they enter into the girls dorm and go their separate ways to go to their rooms, once Alexis arrives at the door to her room, she opens the door and closes it once she is inside. She quickly goes to the table she has and pours out the 10 Berserker Card Booster Packs from the bag and onto the table, then she takes a deep breath, grabs the first Booster Pack from the pile and opens the foil pack. Alexis couldn't help but take in that new card smell as she takes out the 15 cards from their foil pack prison, but she almost gawked when she saw that one of the cards that was in the Booster Pack was an Ultra Rare version of Berserker Dragon Empress, although she noticed that the artwork on the card was of a higher quality than the usual cards that everyone buys.

"(Whistles impressively) you know for a boss monster with 3800 ATK and 3500 DEF, this is quite the appealing card for a bipedal dragoness with insanely huge muscles that makes Obelisk look puny in comparison, although I am impressed that this monsters effect basically directs any attack on a Berserker Monster to attack her instead is pretty sweet. But I wasn't expecting Berserker Dragon Empress being to pull of Contact Fusion with any non Berserker Monster so as long as said monster is a female, it's almost as if the Berserker Monsters were encouraging duelists to mix them into other decks" she said and puts that card to the side as she reads the next card in the booster pack.

Although Alexis has only managed to open 4 more Booster Packs after carefully reading what the remaining 14 cards can do, she was impressed at the level of detail and quality that each card has. From the appealing artwork of the monsters, spells and traps, to the strong yet balanced effects each card has, but what really caught her attention were the monsters and how these women can be so pleasing to the eyes while possessing physiques that'll even make the most musclebound monster in the game sigh in shame. But Alexis noticed that these cards give off something that make the person who's holding them feel empowered, although for some reason she felt like some kind of energy was welling up inside of her waiting to be let out. It was faint but she could notice that whatever this energy is, she can feel it in her muscles, which was quite odd considering that she never worked out in her life.

Even though she knew what she was about to do might end up hurting her, Alexis did a double bicep that she saw on one of the cards called Berserker Brawler, albeit she did it lightly so that she won't get overwhelmed by this energy she feels within her muscles. Suddenly Alexis was beginning to blush as her once non existent biceps grew in size as she was finding herself gaining pleasure from this, but she managed to snap herself out of it and stopped flexing her biceps when they grew to 20 inches, although Alexis was still blushing due to realizing that she has just gained pleasure from making her biceps grow.

"Whoa.......I can't believe I got turned on from doing this, and I was only flexing my biceps lightly! Although as much as I want to open the rest of these Booster Packs right about now, .......I guess it wouldn't hurt if I get the rest of my muscles to be as big as my biceps first" she said as she does just that.

One by one, Alexis managed to grow each muscle on her body to 20 inches, albeit she had a bit of a hard time doing it since she has never flexed any of her muscles before. But just as she stopped flexing her pecs, she finds herself gritting her teeth hard as she tries her best not to give into to the sudden urge to flex harder so that her muscles can grow bigger and stronger, especially since still plans on rebuilding her deck and duel against the Berserker Duelist before nightfall. But the temptation of just allowing herself to give into that urge was strong, although it's a matter of if Alexis's will is stronger than the urge she's trying not to give into.
